attributes.action: Reconise the illness Gulf war syndrome.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the last 15 years the British Government and the MoD have resistance claims from Gulf War Veterans & their Families to reconise the illness GWS.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reconise the illness Gulf war syndrome."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11804.asp

Prime Minister's Office
